import React, { useState } from 'react' import Interface from './Vue/Interface/Interface' import Addition from './Vue/Addition/Addition' const App = () => { const usersData = [ { id: 1, name: 'Tania', username: 'floppydiskette' }, { id: 2, name: 'Craig', username: 'siliconeidolon' }, { id: 3, name: 'Ben', username: 'benisphere' }, ] const [users, setUsers] = useState(usersData) const addUser = user => { user.id = users.length + 1 setUsers([...users, user]) } return (
